dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, so, uh, big news coming out of Air Astana this morning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, so, uh, big news coming out of Air Astana this morning.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They've actually canceled a bunch of their flights to the Middle East. Like, for today, June 23rd.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They've actually canceled a bunch of their flights to the Middle East. Like, for today, June twenty third.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Air Astana has canceled its flights to the Middle East. Due to conflict escalation in the Middle East, the Group of Companies cancels the following flights for 23 June:

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, really? All of them, or just some?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, really? All of them, or just some?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, not all, but, um, a significant number. Specifically, flights to Dubai and Doha from places like Atyrau, Astana, and Almaty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, not all, but, um, a significant number. Specifically, flights to Dubai and Doha from places like Atyrau, Astana, and Almaty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the Group of Companies cancels the following flights for 23 June: KC191/192/Atyrau-Dubai-Atyrau KC205/206/Astana-Dubai-Astana KC897/898/Almaty-Dubai-Almaty KC655/656/Astana-Doha-Astana

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so, like, the main routes. And what's the reason? Conflict escalation, I'm guessing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so, like, the main routes. And what's the reason? Conflict escalation, I'm guessing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Exactly. Yeah, that's what they've cited.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Yeah, that's what they've cited.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, man. So what happens to all those passengers? Are they just stranded?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, man. So what happens to all those passengers? Are they just stranded?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nah, Air Astana is, uh, offering full refunds, which is good. Or, you know, you can rebook for free to a different date.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nah, Air Astana is, uh, offering full refunds, which is good. Or, you know, you can rebook for free to a different date.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Passengers affected by the suspended flights will be offered a full refund or free rebooking to alternative travel dates, the airline announced.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, that's decent at least. So they're just watching the situation then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, that's decent at least. So they're just watching the situation then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they said they're monitoring it really closely and will provide updates if, like, more cancellations happen.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they said they're monitoring it really closely and will provide updates if, like, more cancellations happen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Air Astana stated that it is closely monitoring the situation and will provide updates should further cancellations occur.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. It's just a tough situation for everyone involved, especially for people who had plans.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. It's just a tough situation for everyone involved, especially for people who had plans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And if anyone's affected, they've got 24/7 assistance lines you can call.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And if anyone's affected, they've got twenty four over seven assistance lines you can call.
